--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Firedrill kept on moving as fast as he could, without making the 
ride
> uncompfortable, but he almost ran into the stopped Beachcomber. 
"What is
> it?" he asked, as Beachcomber transformed and stood up. Then 
Firedrill
> realized he didnt need an explanation, as he could hear massive
> explosions close by. All he could think was that Cliffjumper was in
> danger, as he roared around Beachcomber, and towards the danger, 
while
> Beachcomber yelled something about needing a plan.

::REDHOT::

       Redhot was horrified at the sounds of explosions and was 
immedaitely worried for the safety of his frind. He jumped out of the 
cab of Firedrill and hovered in after him. He was grateful that he had 
saved his energy reserves like he had. 


Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
